entries.title: The EV Rivals Aiming for Tesla's Crown in China
entries.description: Tesla in 2019 opened a factory in China that officials hoped would stir the country’s EV makers into action. Now, some of those local carmakers are emerging as strong rivals to the U.S. automaker. See them here.

entries.title: Twitter's Advertising Exodus Accelerates, Despite Outreach From Elon Musk
entries.description: Ad giant Omnicom joins other agencies in recommending brands pause spending, and some companies halt discussions for annual contracts.

entries.title: When Parents Live-Text the Playdate: Endearing or Annoying?
entries.description: The pressure on moms to be perfect often results in a string of kid photos arriving in real time.

entries.title: FTX Is Investigating a Potential Hack Amid Bankruptcy Filing
entries.description: More than $400 million worth of crypto funds appears to be missing, according to a crypto analytics firm.

entries.title: Did a Robot Write This?
entries.description: Not this time, but unbeknownst to most people, AI is churning out articles, illustrations, fake product reviews and even short videos.
